B

Barrier - class zc.thread.Barrier.
Barriers serve as synchronization points for a group of threads that must occasionally wait for each other.
Barrier.Command - interface zc.thread.Barrier.Command.
Interface for functions to run at synchronization points.
Barrier.Rotator - class zc.thread.Barrier.Rotator.
Rotates the array of result objects so that each thread gets the Object presented by the thread next to it.
Barrier.Rotator() - Constructor for class zc.thread.Barrier.Rotator
 
Barrier(Thread[]) - Constructor for class zc.thread.Barrier
Construct a Barrier object for the given list of participants.
Barrier(Thread[], Barrier.Command) - Constructor for class zc.thread.Barrier
Construct a Barrier object for the given list of participants.
BoundedSharedQueue - class zc.thread.BoundedSharedQueue.
A SharedQueue that have a maximum capacity.
BoundedSharedQueue() - Constructor for class zc.thread.BoundedSharedQueue
Construct an SharedQueue with a sufficiently large capacity so that to conceptually simulate an UnboundedSharedQueue.
BoundedSharedQueue(int) - Constructor for class zc.thread.BoundedSharedQueue
Construct a SharedQueue with the given maximum capacity.
BrokenBarrierException - exception zc.thread.BrokenBarrierException.
Thrown by Barriers when their integrity has been compromized.
BrokenBarrierException() - Constructor for class zc.thread.BrokenBarrierException
Constructs a BrokenBarrierException.
BrokenBarrierException(String) - Constructor for class zc.thread.BrokenBarrierException

RWLock - interface zc.thread.RWLock.
A RWLock accepts any number of concurrent Readers when there is no Writer and permits only a single Writer when there is no Readers.

A RWLock that gives priority to Readers.

U

UnboundedSharedQueue - class zc.thread.UnboundedSharedQueue.
Deprecated. Conceptually an UnboundedSharedQueue should be, well, unbounded, but in real world an unbounded queue that grow continually will certainly leads to disasters. Thus UnboundedSharedQueue are simulated with a BoundedSharedQueue of a sufficiently large capacity.
UnboundedSharedQueue() - Constructor for class zc.thread.UnboundedSharedQueue
Deprecated. Construct an UnboundedSharedQueue.
UnboundedSharedQueue(int) - Constructor for class zc.thread.UnboundedSharedQueue
Deprecated. Construct a SharedQueue.

W

workerNumber - Static variable in class zc.thread.SwingWorker
 

Z

zc.thread - package zc.thread
This package provides standardized, efficient versions of utility classes commonly encountered in concurrent Java programming.
